attributes.action: Have more officers patrolling chingford mount area between 12am - 5am
attributes.additional_details:
Hundred of cars have been stolen and broken into in Chingford, it's becoming unbearable. In the last month 10 high performance cars were stolen, 15 cars broken into and damaged. When will this stop?
We need help from the local authorities to stop this indecent behaviour. This is a community which is being ripped apart about by thieves.
attributes.background: We need more officers patrolling chingford mount area between 12am and 5am. More undercover police officers patrolling streets in Chingford during the day and night. Prosecute car thieves with heavy prison sentences. Police need to start investigation car theft, this is part of a wider crime circle

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. This is an operational decision for the police.
